reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's color, with one noting it looks very expensive, and appreciate its great fit, quality, and comfort that's not itchy. The fabric receives positive feedback for being soft and thick, while customers find it flattering, with one mentioning it marks the waist and silhouette beautifully. The length receives mixed reviews - while some find the sleeves long enough, others note it's not suitable for short women. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is beautiful and looks beautiful on!
items.body: This dress is beautiful and looks beautiful on. I am 5'3 180 pounds, hourglass figure. My hips are 41 inches. I got Large which the system recommended and it fits true to size. It's very flattering and classy. I got SO many compliments on this dress, to the point where people just came out and asked where I got it. I have it in blue, black and just ordered the brown. These colors are not see though (someone mentioned the white is-can't comment on that). The material has a good winter weight to it. The dress is soft and warm. One reviewer said it comes wrinkled. Yes, just a little, but I iron steamed on the lowest setting as recommended on the tag, with a mesh cloth on top and the wrinkles came right out without affecting the pleats at all. Seriously....just go ahead and put it in your cart. You won't be disappointed! Read more
items.author: BeautyAllOver

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and soft fit
items.body: The dress is very soft and comfortable. Great for fall weather Read more
items.author: Julie Lott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, well fitted and true to size dress
items.body: This piece is simply beautiful. I am again going to buy another one. It is perfect fit. I’m 5’6” 204 pounds. Bus size is a c. This dress fits true to form with extra space. I got the extra large, but it does not sag or hang incorrectly. It is a beautiful dress very comfortable not squeezing and true to the actual picture and yes, I plan on ordering another. it is just that beautiful. Read more
items.author: Sheila

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this black sweater dress!!!
items.body: This is the perfect sweater dress. I got it in black to wear for funerals (work). Wore it today - love love love! So comfortable, warm but not too warm, fit perfectly. Going to check out another color because the fit is so flattering. Buy this dress! You will be thrilled with it! Read more
items.author: Mary Jo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall wear!
items.body: Great fit, quality and fabric. I’m 6’0 and the length is perfect . The dress is comfortable and not too heavy,even though it’s wool knit . Read more
items.author: AnneMarie Chesterman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but NOT Maxi Dress
items.body: It is a lovely dress, and the sweater material is super soft. My only issue is that I would not call it "maxi" as it was almost mid-calf (and I'm just under 5'5" so I'm not very tall for it to be mid-calf as a maxi dress. That's the only reason for the four-star review. Otherwise, it's a 5! Read more
items.author: Shopaholic

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars For tall women.
items.body: Beautiful dress. Not for short women. Read more
items.author: CR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and flattering
items.body: Extremely flattering fit! I’m 5’7” and small framed and the fit is flattering along with the length of sleeves being long enough. The fabric is soft and heavy enough weight for quality but still has good drape. Really liked this find! Read more
items.author: Sally Black

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Burgundy, Black, Light Pink, Teal, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
